title: Get more people to find your website and learn about your business
point: Not enough people see your website
elaborate: You want more folks to visit your website, but not enough are finding it.

title: Make it easier to find new customers on the internet
elaborate: You want the right customers who will pay and they are tough to find online.

title: Spend your marketing money wisely to get more in return
point: Spending money on Ads, but it doesn't seem to help
elaborate: You're using ads, but they don't seem to be bringing in more business.

title: Create a clear plan for marketing your business online
point: Not sure what to do online
elaborate: You're not sure how to make a plan for making your business known online.

title: Keep up with your competitors and do better online
point: Other companies are doing better online
elaborate: You've noticed that other companies in your field are doing better online than you are.
